Text: RE GROCORPENRONCOMHi Sally Chris Abel informed us that you have a URL that can be decommissioned from a site you own Could you please send me the ok to have the url grocorpenroncom decommissioned thank you chrys Original Message From Abel Chris Sent Monday October PM To Hardy Chrysti Subject GROCORPENRONCOM I am in the process of developing a website for the Global Risk Operations group and wanted to take over the referenced URL It currently belongs to Sally Beck and she has agreed that my group can take it over I have been told that you or Ed Ray are the people to talk to about acquiring a URL Let me know what we need to do to accomplish that Thanks Chris Abel
